description: Make it easy to see the conversations on your favourite Slack channel by adding it to your dashboard. Originates from the Gallery.

zapier-01.name: Slack Messages via Zapier
zapier-01.description: Use Zapier to get your latest slack messages. Originates from the Gallery.

datasourceConfigModel.description:
This Klip relies on Zapier to update the data source. After adding the Klip you will need to setup this Zap

Note: When you first add this Klip data will not be shown because the data source is empty. The data begins accumulating once you setup the Zap and includes all new messages that are added after that.
